sect2.title: Command explanations
sect2.para: install_user=proftpd install_group=proftpd: Specify the user and group identity for ProFTPD.
--prefix=/usr: This installs ProFTPD in /usr instead of /usr/local.
--sysconfigdir=/etc: This prevents the configuration files from going to /usr/etc.
--localstatedir=/var/run: This uses /var/run instead of /usr/var for lock files.
